titleStmt.title: Catalogus librorum bibliothecæ reverend. & eruditi viri D. Samuelis Brooke, aulæ Catharinæ quondam socius. Quorum auctio habenda est Londini, ad insigne Pelicani in vico vulgo dicto Little-Britain vicessimo primo Martii 1680/81. Per Gulielmi Cooper bibliopolam.
titleStmt.author: Brooke, Samuel, d. 1631.

titleStmt.title: Catalogus librorum bibliothecæ reverend. & eruditi viri D. Samuelis Brooke, aulæ Catharinæ quondam socius. Quorum auctio habenda est Londini, ad insigne Pelicani in vico vulgo dicto Little-Britain vicessimo primo Martii 1680/81. Per Gulielmi Cooper bibliopolam.

publicationStmt.publisher: The catalogues are ready to be distributed gratis at the Pelican in Little-Britain, London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the St. John's Library, Cambridge (England).
